resources.string: Please share your result and let us know whether your lies were identified correctly!
I Can See It In Your Eyes

This game exists of two main sections. First, you are shown a screen with 3 cards. You are asked to memorize these cards within 8 seconds. 

After those 8 seconds, a new screen appears, ands shows you a card. The question is whether this is one of the cards that were previously shown to you. You can answer yes or no. You have 8 seconds to answer. 

Instead of telling the truth, you can intentionally give the wrong answer (you choose to bluff). When you do this, please remember when you did this, as this is important for our research. The app will try to see whether your answer was genuine or not.

This game consists of 5 trials, showing 6 cards per trial. In total this means that a single game takes 4 minutes.
